title: Friendly Typeface Recommendations
content:
Do you have any recommendations for friendly typefaces? I'm looking for something warm and approachable, but still somewhat sophisticated.

Any help would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks,

- Schedler
author: schedler

comments.content:
Hi Benjamin,

for what will you use it? A book, a poster, a website?  
I repeatedly have heard people referring to [Dolly](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018223141/http:/www.underware.nl/site2/index.php?id1=dolly&id2=overview) as being a friendly typeface.  
F

Short text: Tekton  
Long text serif: Fresco by Fred Smeijers
